```{r}
#| label: results_righthanded

topo.list <- list(
  "parallel" = c(
    "2LK7",
    "2M4P",
    "2O3M",
    "1XAV",
    "2LPW",
    "2KYP",
    "2LEE",
    "2LXQ",
    "2M27"
  ),
  "antiparallel" = c(
    "5J4W",
    "5J4P",
    "2M6V",
    "201D",
    "2M6W",
    "5J6U",
    "143D",
    "6GZN",
    "2MFT",
    "5J05",
    "148D",
    "2KM3"
  ),
  "hybrid" = c("2MFU", "5YEY", "6AC7", "7ALU", "2JSL", "186D", "2GKU")
)

twist.values <- rbindlist(py$twist_values) %>%
  left_join(
    stack(topo.list) %>%
      rename("topo" = "ind", "pdb" = "values")
  ) %>%
  select(topo, pdb, stack_name, twist_angle, gba_angle_1, gba_angle_2, gba)
#manual corrections to borderline gba values
# mutate(
#   gba = case_when(
#     pdb %in% c("2M4P", "1XAV", "2LEE") ~ 'aa',
#     pdb == '5J4W' & stack_name == '6-7' ~ 'sa',
#     TRUE ~ gba
#   )
# )

DT::datatable(twist.values)

twist.values %>% 
  filter(pdb %in% c("2M4P", "2LK7")) %>% 
  group_by(pdb) %>% 
  summarise(
    mean_twist = mean(twist_angle, na.rm = TRUE),
    sd_twist = sd(twist_angle, na.rm = TRUE)
  )

twist.values %>%
  filter(pdb == '7ALU')

twist.values %>% 
  filter(pdb == '6AC7') 


twist.pdb.summary <- twist.values %>%
  summarise(
    sd.angle = signif(sd(twist_angle, na.rm = TRUE), 1),
    mean.angle = if_else(
      is.na(sd.angle),
      mean(twist_angle),
      round(mean(twist_angle, na.rm = TRUE), max(0, -floor(log10(sd.angle))))
    ),
    n = n(),
    .by = c(pdb, gba)
  ) %>%
  select(1, 2, 4, 3, 5) %>%
  ungroup() %>%
  arrange(sd.angle)

twist.pdb.summary


twist.pdb.righthanded <- twist.values %>%
  left_join(
    stack(topo.list) %>%
      rename("topo" = "ind", "pdb" = "values")
  ) %>%
  group_by(topo, gba) %>%
  summarise(
    sd.angle = signif(sd(twist_angle, na.rm = TRUE), 1),
    mean.angle = round(
      mean(twist_angle, na.rm = TRUE),
      max(0, -floor(log10(sd.angle)))
    ),
    n = n()
  ) %>%
  select(topo, gba, mean.angle, sd.angle, n)
```

```{r}
  mutate(
    type = if_else(
      grepl("3|6|9|12|17|20|23|26", stack_name),
      'aa [core]',
      'aa [interface]'
    )
  ) %>%
  summarise(
    sd.angle = sd(twist_angle) %>% signif(., 1),
    mean.angle = mean(twist_angle, na.rm = TRUE) %>%
      round(
        .,
        max(
          0,
          -floor(log10(sd.angle))
        )
      ),
    n = n(),
    .by = c(pdb, type)
  ) %>%
  mutate(topo = "Z-G4") %>%
  rename("gba" = "type") %>%
  select(topo, gba, mean.angle, sd.angle, n)
```

```{r}
#| label: tbl_summary
table_summary <- rbindlist(list(twist.pdb.righthanded, twist.pdb.zg4)) %>%
  mutate(twist = glue::glue("{mean.angle} Â± {sd.angle}")) %>%
  select(gba, topo, twist, n) %>%
  arrange(gba, -n)

table_summary %>%
  DT::datatable(
    #rename columns
    colnames = c(
      "Topology" = "topo",
      "GBA" = "gba",
      "Twist" = "twist",
      "n" = "n"
    )
  )

# Convert to flextable
ft <- flextable(table_summary) %>%
  merge_v(j = ~gba) %>% # Merge identical values in 'gba'
  theme_vanilla() %>%
  autofit()

# Export to Word
doc <- read_docx() %>%
  body_add_flextable(ft) %>%
  print(target = "images/twist_table_output.docx")
```

```{python}
#| label: other_interfaces_py

#where necessary, the pdb files were modified to have a single A chain with residues from other chains renumbered accordingly
#this way, the function can be applied straightforwardly to all pdb files
#the function was modified to detect and import local file inputs and not only fetch from the pdb

# Define a dictionary to store the stack pairs for each PDB file
stack_pairs_inter = {
    '2LXV': [
        (1, 2), (2, 3),
        (5, 6), (6, 7),
        (10, 11), (11, 12),
        (14, 15), (15, 16),
        (17, 18), (18, 19),
        (21, 22), (22, 23),
        (26, 27), (27, 28),
        (30, 31), (31, 32),
        # interface
        (1, 21), (14, 26), (10, 30), (5, 17)
    ],
    '1Y8D': [
        (27, 26), (26, 1), (1, 2), (2, 3), (3, 4),
        (31, 30), (30, 29), (29, 13), (13, 14), (14, 15),
        (20, 19), (19, 18), (18, 17), (17, 10), (10, 11),
        (24, 23), (23, 22), (22, 6), (6, 7), (7, 8)
    ],
    '2LE6': [
        (1,2), (2, 3),
        (5, 6), (6, 7),
        (9, 10), (10, 11),
        (13, 14), (14, 15),
        (17, 18), (18, 19),
        (21, 22), (22, 23),
        (25, 26), (26, 27),
        (29, 30), (30, 31),
        #interface
        (1, 25), (13, 29), (9, 17), (5, 21)
    ],
    '2AVJ': [
      (41, 42), (42, 43), (43, 44), (44, 1), (1, 2), (2, 3), (3, 4),
      (30, 31), (31, 32), (32, 33), (33, 12), (12, 13), (13, 14), (14, 15),
      (19, 20), (20, 21), (21, 22), (22, 23), (23, 24), (24, 25), (25, 26),
      (8, 9), (9, 10), (10, 11), (11, 34), (34, 35), (35, 36), (36, 37)
    ]
}

# Iterate over the PDB files and calculate the twist angles for each stack pair
interface_pairs = {}
for pdb, stack_pairs_inter in stack_pairs_inter.items():
    interface_pairs[pdb] = pd.DataFrame(
        dt.twist_calc_iterate(f"data/{pdb}.cif", "A", stack_pairs_inter)
    )
```

```{r}
#| label: other_interfaces
py$interface_pairs %>%
  bind_rows() %>%
  mutate(
    core_or_inter = case_when(
      (grepl("2LXV", pdb) &
        stack_name %in% c('1-21', '14-26', '10-30', '5-17') |
        grepl("1Y8D", pdb) &
          stack_name %in% c('18-17', '29-13', '1-2', '22-6') |
        grepl("2LE6", pdb) &
          stack_name %in% c('1-25', '13-29', '9-17', '5-21') |
        grepl("2AVJ", pdb) &
          stack_name %in%
            c(
              '22-23',
              '11-34',
              '44-1',
              '33-12'
            )) ~
        'interface',
      TRUE ~ 'core'
    ),
    pdb = gsub("\\.cif", "", gsub("data/", "", pdb))
  ) %>%
  group_by(pdb, core_or_inter) %>%
  summarise(
    mean = mean(twist_angle, na.rm = TRUE),
    sd = sd(twist_angle, na.rm = TRUE)
  ) %>% 
    arrange(core_or_inter, pdb)
```
